org.hps.test.it

Class ReconTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • org.hps.test.it.ReconTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EngRun2015FeeReconTest, EngRun2015MollerReconTest, EngRun2015V0ReconTest, PhysRun2016FeeReconTest, PhysRun2016MollerReconTest, PhysRun2016V0ReconTest

    public abstract class ReconTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase
    Base class for reconstruction ITs This class downloads a test EVIO input file, runs reconstruction, generates test histograms, and compares them against a reference file. Test-specific parameters such as detector name and test file can be configured through one of the constructors.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static double DEFAULT_TOLERANCE
      The default tolerance level for histogram statistics comparison
      private String detectorName
      The name of the detector geometry
      private File lcioOutputFile
      The LCIO output file (not set by the user)
      private long maxEventTime
      The max time per event to allow without failing (should be generous to allow for performance differences in various environments)
      private int nEvents
      The number of events to run (use -1 for unlimited)
      private RefDriver plotDriver
      A driver instance to generate the local AIDA file
      private boolean printComparisonTable
      Whether to print out the 1D histogram comparison table
      private boolean printMemoryUsage
      Whether to print out memory usage statistics after running recon
      private String steering
      The lcsim steering file resource
      private Class<? extends ReconTest> testClass
      The concrete class of the test, set for convenience
      private String testFileName
      The input file from JLAB
      private double tolerance
      The tolerance for histogram statistics comparison

      Compare reference and test AIDA trees

      Create plots based on the current version of the reconstruction for comparison against the reference histograms

      Get the path to the output AIDA file with no extension

      Print a comparison table of 1D histograms from reference and test plots

      Print memory usage statistics

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReconTest

        public ReconTest(Class<? extends ReconTest> testClass,
                 String detectorName,
                 String testFileName,
                 String steering,
                 int nEvents,
                 RefDriver plotDriver,
                 double tolerance,
                 long maxEventTime,
                 boolean printComparisonTable,
                 boolean printMemoryUsage)
        Fully qualified constructor for reconstruction IT
        Parameters:
        testClass - Concrete class of the test
        detectorName - The name of the detector
        testFileName - The name of the test input file
        steering - The path to the steering resource
        nEvents - The number of events to run (-1 for all)
        plotDriver - The driver to create the test plots
        tolerance - The tolerance level for comparisons with reference plots
        maxEventTime - Max allowed time per event in milliseconds, inclusive (-1 for no check)
        printComparisonTable - True to print the histogram comparison table
        printMemoryUsage - True to print memory usage after running reconstruction

      • ReconTest
